subject: Sir / Madam ,
body:
Sir / Madam ,
I am writing you in respect to a contract with the Nigerian National
Petroleum Company (NNPC). A new management has just taken over and we
discovered that there is an unfinished contract with the Nigerian
National Petroleum Company which was due to be completed in 2018 by a
national of your country. The contract is worth $20.3 Million USD. We
have tried reaching the initial contractor but all efforts proved
abortive. Acting with the orders of the Presidency, we had to go
through your country chamber of commerce and industry to look for a
reputable and capable individual/company to execute the completion of
the contract so had to contact you for this confidential information.
Do acknowledge the receipt of this message by signifying your interest
for further briefing.
Kind regards,
H.M.Sanusi
Email: 
hmsanusi7@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Sir / Madam ,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out and providing this information. It's quite interesting to hear about the situation with the Nigerian National Petroleum Company. I'm curious, could you tell me more about what this contract entails? What kind of work is involved in completing it?

Also, how did you come across my contact information through my country's chamber of commerce and industry? I'm just a simple individual, not a company owner or anything like that.

Looking forward to hearing more from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Melanie
